headline: Ohio Lake Erie Commission seeking submissions for 30th annual ‘Life on Lake Erie’ photo contest
author: Editorial Staff
sentences: The contest is an opportunity for amateur photographers to showcase their talent for photographing one of Ohio’s most valuable natural resources – Lake Erie, according to a news release from the Commission.
To kick off this year-round recognition, the Commission is seeking submissions for the 30th annual “Life on Lake Erie” photo contest.
Throughout 2022, the Ohio Lake Erie Commission (OLEC) is celebrating its 30-year anniversary.
Please, provide an email address to continue reading free articles
